metadata.name: SyncAppvPublishingServer Execute Arbitrary PowerShell Code
metadata.comment: Executes arbitrary PowerShell code using SyncAppvPublishingServer.exe.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\syncappvpublishingserver.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('syncappvpublishingserver.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('"n; ')))

output.summary: Executes arbitrary PowerShell code using SyncAppvPublishingServer.exe.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ComputerName, actor.user.name, process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: App-V clients References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1218/T1218.md, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Syncappvpublishingserver/
